subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Jacques Rogge, president of the International Olympic Committee, said he expected at least 15 doping cases from the Beijing Games. “We had 39 positive cases in the run-up to the Games, 8 during the Games, and 7 more possibly coming up,” Rogge said. Rogge said it would take about six more weeks before all final doping results are available.
